summary.para: Obtains the absolute font file path from the font file reference key.

param.name: fontFileReferenceKey
param.para: Type: const void*
The font file reference key that uniquely identifies the local font file within the scope of the font loader being used.

param.name: fontFileReferenceKeySize
param.para: Type: UINT32
The size of font file reference key in bytes.

param.name: filePath
param.para: Type: WCHAR*
